stories.title: Select a Value from 'Select Value' Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select an option from the 'Select Value' dropdown so that I can choose the appropriate group option.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the 'Select Value' field, Then the text 'Group 1, option 2' should be displayed.

stories.title: Select a Title from 'Select One' Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a title from the 'Select One' dropdown so that I can choose the appropriate title.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the 'Select One' field, Then the text 'Mr.' should be displayed.

stories.title: Select a Color from Old Style Select Menu
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a color from the 'Old Style Select Menu' so that I can specify my color preference.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I click on the 'Old Style Select Menu', Then options including 'Red', 'Blue', and 'Green' should be visible.
Given the dropdown is expanded, When I select 'Red', Then 'Red' should be displayed in the 'Old Style Select Menu' as the selected option.
